name: Nuclear Assault (itch)
description:
A terrorists organization is researching on nuclear weapons to  bring the government into chaos. It's on the special forces ASSAULT with her best pilot Valentina to prevent the impending disaster. Start the new military combat helicopter AV64 and send the mercenaries to hell before it's too late!

Overview:

- 3 exciting Missions

- Upgrade the AV64 with more Weapons and Power

- Ingame Manual

Take off and enjoy the fly!
